results.title: Journalism
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A straightforward account of a sometimes over-glamorised profession. The copy boy carries out menial tasks; the cadet learns how to report crime, general, parliamentary, financial and sporting news. The erratic hours of work are shown to apply to radio and television journalism as well as to newspaper work, and the basic demands of the work are similar.
results.description:

results.title: Textile technician
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”
Complex machinery is necessary at the various levels of textile manufacture. Follows the raw cotton through the spinning mill as it is processed into yarn. Then to the knitting mill, where yarn is woven into knitted garments. In the weaving mill, entirely different processes are carried out by different machines. Throughout the film, textile technicians are seen servicing this specialised machinery, some of which can tie the ends of broken yarn together again.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”
Complex machinery is necessary at the various levels of textile manufacture. Follows the raw cotton through the spinning mill as it is processed into yarn. Then to the knitting mill, where yarn is woven into knitted garments. In the weaving mill, entirely different processes are carried out by different machines. Throughout the film, textile technicians are seen servicing this specialised machinery, some of which can tie the ends of broken yarn together again.

results.title: Physiotherapy
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A vocational guidance film showing how physiotherapists assist patients to recover the use of limbs after injuries, etc. Demonstrates various techniques used and shows training briefly.

results.title: Aircraft maintenance
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”
Discusses general overhaul maintenance of aircraft, whether it be commercial, passer or light aircraft. Includes TAA, Qantas, East-West, Cessner airlines. Also talks about testing and checking procedures and what the engineer should be looking for; the role of the engineer and qualifications required for this career.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”

Also talks about testing and checking procedures and what the engineer should be looking for; the role of the engineer and qualifications required for this career.

results.title: Occupational therapy
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A vocational guidance film showing how occupational therapists assist disabled people, by devising jobs and exercises, to recover their sense of independence. Demonstrates techniques and shows training briefly.
results.description:

results.title: Building trades
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A vocational guidance film showing the work of tradesmen in the construction of a house, an office block or a factory, including bricklayers, plasterers, tilers and carpenters. Discusses careers available to building tradesmen as supervisors or in their own building companies.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A vocational guidance film showing the work of tradesmen in the construction of a house, an office block or a factory, including bricklayers, plasterers, tilers and carpenters. Discusses careers available to building tradesmen as supervisors or in their own building companies.
